summary: This FBI Guardian Complaint Form documents a USPS mail tip received by the New York FBI from inmate Forest Fate. Fate's letter, forwarded by Judge Richard Berman, contains unverified allegations about an unnamed Jewish female victim of paternal rape who later allegedly visited Jeffrey Epstein's mansion and was involved in homicides. The document notes Fate is a repeat complainant and references a prior case where he offered information on an OCDETF/RICO investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly had an unnamed Jewish girl visit his mansion after she became highly favored on a 'seeking arrangements' website.

persons.name: Forest Fate
persons.context: Repeat complainant and inmate at Five Points Correctional Facility who sent a letter alleging an unnamed Jewish girl was raped by her father, visited Epstein, and was involved in homicides.

persons.name: Richard M. Berman
persons.context: Forwarded Forest Fate's letter to the NYC FBI ADIC. His court is the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Phill
persons.context: Individual allegedly killed by the unnamed Jewish girl via Fentanyl injection, according to Forest Fate's claims.

connections.description: Fate provides unsolicited allegations and information about Epstein and an unnamed associate to the FBI via mail.
Fate sent a letter to Judge Berman, who then forwarded it to the FBI.

events.title: Forest Fate's Allegation Letter
events.description: Forest Fate writes a letter from prison alleging an unnamed Jewish girl was raped by her father from age 8, became pregnant, visited Jeffrey Epstein's mansion at age 14, and was involved in homicides.

events.title: Judge Berman Forwards Letter to FBI
events.description: Judge Richard M. Berman forwards Forest Fate's letter to the NYC FBI ADIC.

events.title: FBI Creates Guardian Complaint
events.description: The FBI documents the mail tip from Forest Fate via a Guardian Complaint Form, assessing the information.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Forest Fate, an inmate, sent unsolicited allegations to Judge Berman about an unnamed Jewish female who was allegedly raped by her father from age 8, visited Jeffrey Epstein's mansion at 14, and was involved in homicides.
Fate claims the unnamed girl is responsible for approximately 3 homicides, including injecting an individual named Phill with Fentanyl.
Fate alleges the girl's father, described as well-respected and powerful, covered up these crimes for her.
The FBI document notes Fate is a repeat complainant and that a prior case (245D-NY-307101) exists where he offered information on an OCDETF/RICO investigation.
The document's purpose is to record a tip; the allegations are unverified and come from an incarcerated individual.
